title: Fix text contrast — bright white text across all sections

requirements.text: In ServicesSection.tsx, set all text elements — section label ('WHAT WE DO'), section heading ('Our Services'), subtitle/description text, service card titles, service card description text, and feature labels — to bright white (#FFFFFF). These are currently rendering in a very dark color nearly invisible against the dark background.

quotes: keep the dark background but use bright white text everywhere for maximum contrast
Services section: Headings and body text are nearly invisible against the dark background

acceptanceCriteria: The 'WHAT WE DO' label is clearly visible in orange or white
The 'Our Services' heading renders in bright white (#FFFFFF)
All service card titles are bright white and legible
All service card description/body text is bright white and legible against the dark background
All feature/icon labels are bright white and legible

requirements.text: In Layout.tsx (navigation header), set all nav link text — Services, About, Testimonials, Gallery, Contact — to bright white (#FFFFFF) with sufficient opacity (no gray or muted tones). The logo text and any other header text should also be bright white. This applies to the scrolled/white-background header state as well — either force the header to always remain dark-background, or ensure nav text is dark enough to be visible on a light background.

quotes: Navigation: Nav links are gray on white — hard to read
keep the dark background but use bright white text everywhere for maximum contrast

acceptanceCriteria: All navigation links (Services, About, Testimonials, Gallery, Contact) are clearly visible in all scroll states
The header background is always dark (no white/transparent state that makes text invisible)
Nav link text color is bright white (#FFFFFF) or close to it with no gray/muted styling

requirements.text: In AboutSection.tsx, set all text elements — section heading, all body/paragraph text, highlight card labels (Eco-Friendly, Precision Tech, Certified Team, Fast Turnaround) — to bright white (#FFFFFF). These are currently dark-colored and nearly invisible against the dark background.

quotes: About section: Body text and descriptions blend into the dark background
keep the dark background but use bright white text everywhere for maximum contrast

acceptanceCriteria: About section heading is bright white and clearly visible
All body/paragraph text in the About section is bright white (#FFFFFF)
Highlight card labels (Eco-Friendly, Precision Tech, Certified Team, Fast Turnaround) are bright white and legible

requirements.text: Audit all remaining page sections — HeroSection, TestimonialsSection, GallerySection, BookingForm, ContactSection — and apply bright white (#FFFFFF) to any text that is currently using dark, gray, or muted colors that render poorly on a dark background. Ensure consistent maximum-contrast white text throughout the entire public-facing site.

acceptanceCriteria: All headings, body text, labels, and descriptions across Hero, Testimonials, Gallery, Booking Form, and Contact sections are bright white on dark backgrounds
No text element appears invisible or low-contrast against any dark background
